metadata.name: Cosmic Fragmentation
metadata.description: Edition 1 - Cosmic Fragmentation is a mesmerizing digital abstract art piece that captures the essence of transformation and exploration. At its center stands an astronaut, seemingly suspended in space, while fragments of their body disintegrate into delicate triangles. The dynamic background, in constant motion, creates an illusion of upward movement, emphasizing the astronaut's ascent. This artwork ignites contemplation on our transient nature, unlocking the mind to the limitless potential within us and our energy.
